params.registrant: The account that incremented the nonce.
The account that registered the stealth meta-address.
params.schemeId: Identifier corresponding to the applied stealth address scheme, e.g. 1 for secp256k1, as specified in ERC-5564.
params.stealthMetaAddress: The stealth meta-address. [ERC-5564](https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-5564) bases the format for stealth meta-addresses on [ERC-3770](https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-3770) and specifies them as:   st:<shortName>:0x<spendingPubKey>:<viewingPubKey> The chain (`shortName`) is implicit based on the chain the `ERC6538Registry` is deployed on, therefore this `stealthMetaAddress` is just the compressed `spendingPubKey` and `viewingPubKey` concatenated.

DOMAIN_SEPARATOR().details: The domain separator is re-computed if there's a chain fork.

params.schemeId: Identifier corresponding to the applied stealth address scheme, e.g. 1 for secp256k1, as specified in ERC-5564.

registerKeysOnBehalf(address,uint256,byt.details: Supports both EOA signatures and EIP-1271 signatures.Reverts if the signature is invalid.

params.schemeId: Identifier corresponding to the applied stealth address scheme, e.g. 1 for secp256k1, as specified in ERC-5564.
params.signature: A signature from the `registrant` authorizing the registration.

nonceOf.details: `registrant` is the user address.`nonce` will be incremented after each valid `registerKeysOnBehalf` call.

stealthMetaAddressOf.details: `registrant` may be a standard 160-bit address or any other identifier.`schemeId` is an integer identifier for the stealth address scheme.

ERC6538Registry__InvalidSignature().notice: Emitted when an invalid signature is provided to `registerKeysOnBehalf`.

NonceIncremented(address,uint256).notice: Emitted when a registrant increments their nonce.

StealthMetaAddressSet(address,uint256,by.notice: Emitted when a registrant updates their stealth meta-address.

DOMAIN_SEPARATOR().notice: Returns the domain separator used in this contract.

ERC6538REGISTRY_ENTRY_TYPE_HASH().notice: The EIP-712 type hash used in `registerKeysOnBehalf`.

incrementNonce().notice: Increments the nonce of the sender to invalidate existing signatures.

nonceOf(address).notice: A nonce used to ensure a signature can only be used once.

registerKeys(uint256,bytes).notice: Sets the caller's stealth meta-address for the given scheme ID.

registerKeysOnBehalf(address,uint256,byt.notice: Sets the `registrant`'s stealth meta-address for the given scheme ID.

stealthMetaAddressOf(address,uint256).notice: Next nonce expected from `user` to use when signing for `registerKeysOnBehalf`.

userdoc.notice: `ERC6538Registry` contract to map accounts to their stealth meta-address. See [ERC-6538](https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-6538) to learn more.
